name: CALIFORNIA ASSOCIATION OF LOCAL CONSERVATION CORPS (CALCC)
sampleDescriptions: Mobilizing the next diverse generation of Americans to work conserving our public lands and waters, bolstering community resilience, and advancing environmental justice through the California Associat
